argument.name: tablename
argument.description: Table_Name is an entry in the Tables/Sets tab on the Control Panel.

page.description: Get the filename of the table, if name specified, returns full path to provided database name.
page.discussion: The TABLE.FILENAME_GET() method returns the filename of Table_Name. Contrast this with .FILENAME_GET() method which returns the filename of the table referenced by the object pointer. Note : If you are working with a shadow database (created by a Network Optimization operation), Filename will be the file name of the shadow table. If you want the filename of the real table, use the TABLE.ACTUAL_FILENAME_GET() method.

section.description: This script returns the filename of the customer table.
